custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND [$STATUS$] AND [$FOLDER_ID$] AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (classNameId = ?) AND (structureId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.userId = ?) AND ([$FOLDER_ID$]) AND [$STATUS$] AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.companyId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND ([$FOLDER_ID$]) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND ( (JournalArticle.articleId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.version = ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(JournalArticle.title) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.content LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.displayDate >= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.displayDate <= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.reviewDate <= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND (JournalArticle.type_ = ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.structureId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.templateId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL)
SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle WHERE (classNameId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND (expirationDate <= ?)
SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle WHERE (classNameId = ?) AND (reviewDate >= ?) AND (reviewDate <= ?)
SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle WHERE (resourcePrimKey = ?) AND (displayDate <= ?) AND (status = 0) AND (indexable = [$TRUE$]) ORDER BY version DESC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FOLDER_ID$] AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.structureId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.userId = ?) AND ([$FOLDER_ID$]) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.companyId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND ([$FOLDER_ID$]) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND ( (JournalArticle.articleId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.version = ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(JournalArticle.title) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.content LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.displayDate >= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.displayDate <= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.reviewDate <= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND (JournalArticle.type_ = ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.structureId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.templateId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalFeed WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND ( (feedId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(description) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

SELECT {JournalFeed.*} FROM JournalFeed WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND ( (feedId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(description) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ORDER BY feedId ASC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = 0) AND ([$STATUS$]) [$ARTICLE_FOLDER_ID$]
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalFolder WHERE (JournalFolder.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT DISTINCT JournalArticle.folderId AS modelFolderId, JournalArticle.articleId as articleId, JournalArticle.version AS version, 0 AS modelFolder, JournalArticle.displayDate as displayDate, JournalArticle.modifiedDate as modifiedDate FROM ( SELECT MAX(JournalArticle.id_) AS id_ FROM JournalArticle WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = 0) AND ([$STATUS$]) [$ARTICLE_FOLDER_ID$] GROUP BY JournalArticle.folderId, JournalArticle.articleId ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN JournalArticle ON (TEMP_TABLE.id_ = JournalArticle.id_)
SELECT {JournalFolder.*} FROM JournalFolder WHERE (folderId NOT IN ( SELECT classPK FROM AssetEntry WHERE classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.JOURNAL.MODEL.JOURNALFOLDER$] ))

SELECT DISTINCT folderId AS modelFolderId, '' AS articleId, 0 AS version, 1 AS modelFolder, JournalFolder.createDate as displayDate, JournalFolder.modifiedDate as modifiedDate FROM JournalFolder WHERE (JournalFolder.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$]
